name: Envisaged Echoes
desc: Envisaged Echoes is a high difficulty permanent challenge gameplay constantly updated each season and rewards character's Echo cosmetic. It is unlocked after completing Act 6 of Imaginarium Theater at Adventure Rank 35.

value.name: Imaginarium Theater
value.desc:
The Imaginarium Theater is a permanent domain with challenges constantly updated on the 1st of each month. It is unlocked at Adventure Rank 35.

Before the beginning of all stories, after the end of all tales, in the interstice between reality and fantasy, there is an endless drama unfolding, never ceasing upon the stage – There is no beginning, nor an end, for in the telling of the "story," the two differ not.

customize.text: After completing the corresponding Envisaged Echoes challenges, the cosmetic Echo reward for the character can be obtained. Through the character's Outfit page, Travelers can equip the Echoes they have earned.

customize.name: Dehya
customize.desc: A member of the Eremites, a mercenary organization that roams the sands of Sumeru. Valiant and powerful, she enjoys great fame amongst her fellow Eremites.

customize.name: Venti
customize.desc: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

customize.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
customize.desc: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

customize.name: Diluc
customize.desc: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

customize.name: Kirara
customize.desc: A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

customize.name: Qiqi
customize.desc: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

customize.name: Jean
customize.desc: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

customize.text:
In a corner of the Theater Lobby, vibrant colors have emerged on a once-blank canvas. When someone touches the canvas, it transports them to different domains, based upon their different experiences…
Explore the worlds within the painting with specific companions, and perhaps precious memories may be painted into peerless pictures.

Each <color=#ffe14b>Envisaged Echoes</color> challenge corresponds to a designated character.
To participate in the challenge stages, the character must meet 2 conditions.
The character's <color=#ffffff>Level</color> must be <color=#ffffff>90</color> <color=#ffffff73>.</color>
The character's <color=#ffffff>Friendship Level</color> must be at least <color=#ffffff>8</color> .
The challenge stage for the character can be unlocked using 2
. After unlocking the stage, it will not require any Keys for any subsequent challenges of the same stage but the challenge will only be accessible when both requirements are met.

Keys of Echoes can be obtained in 2 methods.
1. Travelers will receive <color=#ffffff>2</color> Keys initially.
2. Complete and finalize <color=#ffffff>Act 6</color> in the <color=#ffe14b>Normal Difficulty</color> <color=#ffffff73>in</color> each season of the

to receive <color=#ffffff>1</color> Key.
3. Complete and finalize <color=#ffffff>Act 10</color> in the <color=#ffe14b>Visionary Difficulty</color> in each season of the

customize.name: Imaginarium Theater

The Imaginarium Theater is a permanent domain with challenges constantly updated on the 1st of each month. It is unlocked at Adventure Rank 35.

Before the beginning of all stories, after the end of all tales, in the interstice between reality and fantasy, there is an endless drama unfolding, never ceasing upon the stage – There is no beginning, nor an end, for in the telling of the "story," the two differ not.

customize.text:
to receive <color=#ffffff>1</color> Key.
Keys must be collected before Imaginarium Theater season refreshes as unclaimed Keys will not be saved.
4 Keys of Echoes can be stored at once but Travelers will not be able to claim more Keys while at the limit.

imgDesc.text:
Reach the requirements in the Imaginarium Theater performance challenge to gain Keys of Echoes.
Each 2 Keys you consume allows you to unlock 1 character's Envisaged Echoes stage. After completing the challenges, you can obtain that character's Echo cosmetic.
